dcterms:description: The Oulu-CASIA dataset is a facial expression recognition dataset that contains 6 expressions: Happy, Sad, Surprised, Angry, Fear, and Disgust. It was collected from 80 people in a lab environment, with videos recorded at 25 frames per second and a spatial resolution of 320 × 240.
dcterms:title: Oulu-CASIA dataset
